ResourceHeader.Description: Worthington (WRTH) Magnetometer Station is located in Worthington, Minnesota, USA. It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Worthington fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Prof. Richard Dalrymple, West Minnesota Technical College.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Worthington Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Worthington Ground Magnetometer Station
